item.title: E-scooter on footpath, 11th August
item.description:
Scooter left on footpath linking Noverton Avenue and Desert Orchid Road. This path is used by a local with a mobility scooter. Surely from the amount of times these scooters are being left in this vicinity it should be possible to trace the users and fine them or block them from using the scooters. I’m sure if it was my car left on a pavement I wouldn’t get away with it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Piccadilly Way, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
